item.title: Update Win10 to Win11 VM
item.description: Update Win10 to Win11 VM Because I do need to use Microsoft Windows from time to time. migrating to TPM and UEFI on windows VM for windows 11 prep https://www.maketecheasier.com/convert-legacy-bios-uefi-windows10/
